data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during CRESCENT cruise from Port Royal to Plymouth started at 1802-07-18
Ship: Crescent (5th Rate Frigate), Voyage: Port Royal - Plymouth, 1st Observer: James Carthew (Captain), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 38G 868BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
